article: Spend some time researching the topic you want to cover online. Also check out your local library to see if there are any good books on the topic. Depending on the type of article you’re writing, you may need to do some in-depth research [3]. If you’re writing about a celebrity or writing a news article, it’s a good idea to conduct interviews. When conducting an interview, have a list of questions ready so you don’t forget the most important ones. Arrive on time and be respectful. Record the interview or take good notes so you can quote the person accurately. Returning to the example of the article about traditional Christmas foods, interview a few friends to find out what they like to eat. Also, do some research on food safety so you can provide sound advice on how to properly cook a turkey. radoin
